alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Colbert and northeastern Franklin Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 825 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belgreen, or 7 miles northwest of Russellville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and up to dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Muscle Shoals, Russellville, Tuscumbia, Littleville, New Bethel, Crooked Oak, La Grange, Colbert Heights, Cedar Creek Reservoir and Northwest Alabama Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Alabama.
